price: Kung loloobin Niya ay mag-aalis Siya sa inyo at magdadala Siya ng isang nilikhang bago.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadīdin
